02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.description: As combat unfolds, Kazzara tears open |cFF2959D3|Hspell:407196|h[Dread Rifts]|h|r from which |cFF2959D3|Hspell:407069|h[Rays of Anguish]|h|r will form to hunt players. At 80%, 60%, and 40% health remaining, plates of Kazzara's menacing armor are shattered off during |cFF2959D3|Hspell:401319|h[Hellsteel Carnage]|h|r, intensifying her |cFF2959D3|Hspell:408367|h[Infernal Heart]|h|r.
02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.title: Overview

02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.description: $bullet;|cFF2959D3|Hspell:404744|h[Terror Claws]|h|r inflict heavy damage and increase damage taken from further casts.\n$bullet;Upon reaching 100 energy, |cFF2959D3|Hspell:400430|h[Hellbeam]|h|r is unleashed inflicting massive damage to anyone caught in the effect.
02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.title: Tanks

02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.description: Powerful elementium plates maintain the integrity of Kazzara's volatile core. At 80%, 60%, and 40% health, sections of armor are shattered off into |cffffffffHellsteel Fragments|r. The calamitous blast inflicts 122,682 Shadowflame damage to all players.
02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.title: Hellsteel Carnage

02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.description: Upon reaching 100 energy, Kazzara unleashes an annihilating beam from her jaws, inflicting 184,022 Shadowflame damage every 0.3 sec for 3 sec to any players caught inside. The superheated breath inflicts an additional 10,223 Shadowflame damage every 0.3 sec to all players.\n\nKazzara disgorges increasing amounts of |cffffffffRevenant's Blood|r as her armor is shattered off.
02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.title: Hellbeam

02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.description: Kazzara thrashes her fiery wings, inflicting 102,235 Shadowflame damage to all players and pushing them away. The flames linger, inflicting an additional 28,626 Shadowflame damage every 2 sec for 20 sec.
02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.title: Wings of Extinction

02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.description: Kazzara releases a furious roar that incites a burning mark within several players. After 5 sec, unworldly rifts tear open beneath these players in a torrent of dreadfire inflicting 163,575 Shadowflame damage within 5 yards.\n\nKazzara's exposed core causes |cffffffffDread Rifts|r to target an additional player for each piece of armor that has been shattered.
02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.title: Dread Rifts

02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.description: Kazzara's armor shatters into blazing metal scraps, each inflicting 204,469 Shadowflame damage within 4 yards of impact.
02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.title: Hellsteel Fragment

02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.description: Kazzara lacerates her target, inflicting 613,408 Physical damage and 204,469 Shadowflame damage. The charred gashes inflict 57,251 Shadowflame damage every 1 sec and increase damage taken from further |cffffffffTerror Claws|r by 200% for 25 sec.
02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.title: Terror Claws

02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.description: The searing heat of the |cffffffffDread Rift|r inflicts 81,778 Shadowflame damage every 1 sec to players standing within the effect.
02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.title: Riftburn

02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.description: Kazzara summons fragments of blazing energy to blast out from |cffffffffDread Rifts|r. Each fragment ignites a blistering beam and hunts a nearby player, leaving a |cffffffffMolten Scar|r in its wake. Touching the beam inflicts 122,682 Shadowflame damage every 0.3 sec.\n\n|TInterface\EncounterJournal\UI-EJ-WarningTextIcon:0:0:0:0|t|CFF741A02On Heroic and Mythic difficulties, Rays of Anguish will continue to hunt players until they are consumed by a Dread Rift.|r
02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.title: Rays of Anguish

02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.description: Scorched ground that inflicts 73,652 Shadowflame damage every 1 sec to players standing within the effect.
02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.title: Molten Scar

02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.description: Kazzara's exposed core pulses with her molten heartbeat inflicting 32,715 Shadowflame damage to all players every 4 sec, hastening as she loses more armor.
02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.title: Infernal Heart

02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.description: Kazzara's gruesome wounds spew out masses of her lifeblood, each inflicting 163,575 Shadowflame damage within 3 yards of impact.
02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.title: Revenant's Blood

02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.description: If a Ray of Anguish is still active by the next cast, it will gain |cffffffffRelentless Torment|r. The beam speeds up and begins to emanate with seething rage inflicting 40,894 Shadowflame damage to all players every 2 sec, growing in intensity by 50% with each pulse.
02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.title: Relentless Torment

02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.description: $bullet;|cFF2959D3|Hspell:407069|h[Rays of Anguish]|h|r hunt players and leave behind a |cFF2959D3|Hspell:402421|h[Molten Scar]|h|r until they are consumed by a |cFF2959D3|Hspell:407046|h[Dread Rift]|h|r.\n$bullet;Upon reaching 100 energy, |cFF2959D3|Hspell:400430|h[Hellbeam]|h|r is unleashed inflicting massive damage to anyone caught in the effect.
02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.title: Damage Dealers

02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.description: $bullet;|cFF2959D3|Hspell:407069|h[Rays of Anguish]|h|r hunt players and leave behind a |cFF2959D3|Hspell:402421|h[Molten Scar]|h|r until they are consumed by a |cFF2959D3|Hspell:407046|h[Dread Rift]|h|r.\n$bullet;|cFF2959D3|Hspell:403326|h[Wings of Extinction]|h|r and |cFF2959D3|Hspell:408367|h[Infernal Heart]|h|r inflict heavy raidwide damage.
02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.title: Healers

02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.description: Scorched ground that inflicts 73,652 Shadowflame damage every 1 sec to players standing within.
02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.title: Molten Scar

03:The Amalgamation Chamber.description: The Eternal Blaze and The Essense of Shadow pulse with energy, applying |cFF2959D3|Hspell:402617|h[Blazing Heat]|h|r and |cFF2959D3|Hspell:401809|h[Corrupting Shadow]|h|r to nearby players. When either elemental reaches 50% health remaining, the two elementals combine to create The Shadowflame Amalgamation.
03:The Amalgamation Chamber.title: Overview

03:The Amalgamation Chamber.description: $bullet; The Eternal Blaze and Essence of Shadow combine their health to form the Shadowflame Amalgamation when one reaches 50% health remaining.\n$bullet; |cFF2959D3|Hspell:401809|h[Corrupting Shadows]|h|r and |cFF2959D3|Hspell:402617|h[Blazing Heat]|h|r are periodically applied to players nearby each elemental.
03:The Amalgamation Chamber.title: Damage Dealers

03:The Amalgamation Chamber.description: $bullet; |cFF2959D3|Hspell:401809|h[Corrupting Shadows]|h|r and |cFF2959D3|Hspell:402617|h[Blazing Heat]|h|r are periodically applied to players nearby each elemental.\n$bullet; |cFF2959D3|Hspell:403748|h[Fiery Meteor]|h|r inflicts massive damage, split among players in the effect.\n$bullet; |cFF2959D3|Hspell:405394|h[Shadowflame Contamination]|h|r inflicts increasing damage until the Shadowflame Amalgamation is defeated.
03:The Amalgamation Chamber.title: Healers

03:The Amalgamation Chamber.description: The Essence of Shadow detonates a mass of coalescent dark energy, inflicting 408,939 Shadow damage to players within 50 yards of the detonation point. Players farther from the detonation receive less damage.
03:The Amalgamation Chamber.title: Coalescing Void

03:The Amalgamation Chamber.description: The Essence of Shadow wreathes several players in darkness. Each player erupts after 6 sec, inflicting 143,128 Shadow damage to players within 8 yards and creating |cffffffffLingering Umbra|r.
03:The Amalgamation Chamber.title: Umbral Detonation

03:The Amalgamation Chamber.description: The Essence of Shadow pierces its current target with a dark spike, inflicting 245,363 Shadow Damage.
03:The Amalgamation Chamber.title: Shadow Spike

03:The Amalgamation Chamber.description: The Eternal Blaze calls down a fiery meteor nearby, inflicting 1.2 million Fire damage split evenly among all players within 8 yards of the impact location. If |cffffffffFiery Meteor|r fails to hit at least one player, it detonates and inflicts 408,939 Fire damage to all players.
03:The Amalgamation Chamber.title: Fiery Meteor

03:The Amalgamation Chamber.description: The Eternal Blaze calls down fireballs at nearby locations that inflict 143,128 Fire damage to players within 5 yards of the impact locations. If any fireball fails to hit a player, it inflicts 163,575 Fire damage to all players.
03:The Amalgamation Chamber.title: Molten Eruption

03:The Amalgamation Chamber.description: The Eternal Blaze expels swirling flames in the direction of a nearby player that inflicts 245,363 Fire damage to players caught in their path.
03:The Amalgamation Chamber.title: Swirling Flame

03:The Amalgamation Chamber.description: The Shadowflame Amalgamation calls down a dark meteor nearby, inflicting 1.8 million Shadowflame damage split evenly among all players within 8 yards of the impact location. If |cffffffffGloom Conflagration|r fails to hit at least 5 players, it detonates and inflicts 490,726 Shadowflame damage to all players.\n\nThe impact creates an orb of energy that detonates shortly afterwards, inflicting 552,067 Shadowflame damage to all players. Players farther from the detonation point receive less damage.
03:The Amalgamation Chamber.title: Gloom Conflagration

03:The Amalgamation Chamber.description: The Shadowflame Amalgamation wreathes several players in shadowflame. Each target erupts after 6 sec, inflicting 143,128 Shadowflame damage to players within 8 yards and creating |cffffffffEngulfing Heat|r.\n\nEach target also erupts with |cffffffffSwirling Shadowflame|r.
03:The Amalgamation Chamber.title: Blistering Twilight

03:The Amalgamation Chamber.description: The dark residue inflicts 69,520 Shadow damage every 1 sec to players within the area.
03:The Amalgamation Chamber.title: Lingering Umbra

03:The Amalgamation Chamber.description: The Eternal Blaze slashes its current target with fiery claws, inflicting 245,363 Fire damage.
03:The Amalgamation Chamber.title: Flame Slash

03:The Amalgamation Chamber.description: The Shadowflame Amalgamation releases a burst of flames in the direction of its current target, inflicting 408,939 Shadowflame damage to players in a frontal cone.
03:The Amalgamation Chamber.title: Shadowflame Burst

03:The Amalgamation Chamber.description: The Shadowflame Amalgamation slashes its current target with dark claws, inflicting 613,408 Physical damage and increasing their Shadowflame damage taken by 200% for 10 sec.
03:The Amalgamation Chamber.title: Withering Vulnerability

03:The Amalgamation Chamber.description: Blistering Twilight causes dark flames to erupt outwards from the target, inflicting 245,363 Shadowflame damage and knocking back players caught in their path.
03:The Amalgamation Chamber.title: Swirling Shadowflame

03:The Amalgamation Chamber.description: The engulfing flames left behind by |cffffffffBlistering Twilight|r inflict 69,520 Shadowflame damage every 1 to players within the area.
03:The Amalgamation Chamber.title: Engulfing Heat

03:The Amalgamation Chamber.description: Orbs of darkness converge on the Essence of Shadows location, inflicting 245,363 Shadow damage to players in their path.
03:The Amalgamation Chamber.title: Shadows Convergence

03:The Amalgamation Chamber.description: The Shadowflame Amalgamation calls down black fireballs at nearby locations that inflict 163,575 Shadowflame damage to players within 5 yards of the impact locations. If any fireball fails to hit a player, it inflicts 204,469 Shadowflame damage to all players.\nOrbs of darkness then converge on the impact location, inflicting 327,151 Shadowflame damage to players in their path.
03:The Amalgamation Chamber.title: Convergent Eruption

03:The Amalgamation Chamber.description: The Essence of Shadow pulses every 5 sec, applying |cffffffffCorrupting Shadow|r to players within 50 yards. This dark energy inflicts 8,997 Shadow damage every 5 sec and reduces maximum health by 1% for 20 sec. This effect stacks.
03:The Amalgamation Chamber.title: Corrupting Shadow

03:The Amalgamation Chamber.description: The Eternal Blaze pulses every 5 sec, applying |cffffffffBlazing Heat|r to players within 50 yards. This searing heat inflicts 2,454 Fire damage every 1 sec for 20 sec. This effect stacks.
03:The Amalgamation Chamber.title: Blazing Heat

03:The Amalgamation Chamber.description: The Shadowflame Amalgamation pulses every 10 sec, applying |cffffffffShadowflame Contamination|r to all players. This dark flame inflicts 5,112 Shadowflame damage every 2 sec and reduces maximum health by 1%. This effect stacks.
03:The Amalgamation Chamber.title: Shadowflame Contamination

03:The Amalgamation Chamber.description: The elementals' damage is increased by 200% while within 25 yards of each other.
03:The Amalgamation Chamber.title: Elemental Instability

03:The Amalgamation Chamber.description: Cinders of The Eternal Blaze's essence fly off around her inflicting 122,682 Fire Damage to players within 10 yards of the impact.
03:The Amalgamation Chamber.title: Splintered Flames

03:The Amalgamation Chamber.description: Splinters of The Essence of Shadow fly off around him inflicting 122,682 Shadow Damage to players within 10 yards of the impact.
03:The Amalgamation Chamber.title: Splintered Shadow

03:The Amalgamation Chamber.description: $bullet; The Eternal Blaze and Essence of Shadow gain |cFF2959D3|Hspell:408095|h[Elemental Instability]|h|r while near each other.\n$bullet; |cFF2959D3|Hspell:403699|h[Shadow Spike]|h|r and |cFF2959D3|Hspell:403203|h[Flame Slash]|h|r inflict heavy magic damage.\n$bullet;The combination of |cFF2959D3|Hspell:405914|h[Withering Vulnerability]|h|r and |cFF2959D3|Hspell:406783|h[Shadowflame Burst]|h|r inflicts massive damage.
03:The Amalgamation Chamber.title: Tanks

04:The Forgotten Experiments.description:
The forgotten experiments within Neltharion's laboratory each represent a dark stage in the development of the dracthyr. Neldris enters the fray first and assaults the laboratory's intruders with |cFF2959D3|Hspell:406358|h[Rending Charge]|h|r.

Upon Neldris' defeat, Thadrion bursts from his containment vat, afflicting players with |cFF2959D3|Hspell:405042|h[Unstable Essence]|h|r and belching forth |cFF2959D3|Hspell:405492|h[Volatile Spew]|h|r.

As Rionthus' predecessor is defeated, he escapes his containment vat and begins to devastate the chamber with Neltharion's most potent version of |cFF2959D3|Hspell:406227|h[Deep Breath]|h|r.|r
04:The Forgotten Experiments.title: Overview

04:The Forgotten Experiments.description: $bullet;|cFF2959D3|Hspell:406305|h[Infused Strikes]|h|r inflict increasing Arcane damage.\n$bullet;Rionthus soars across the room during |cFF2959D3|Hspell:406227|h[Deep Breath]|h|r.
04:The Forgotten Experiments.title: Tanks

04:The Forgotten Experiments.description: Neldris unleashes a shockwave that inflicts 286,257 Physical damage to players in a frontal cone.\n
04:The Forgotten Experiments.title: Massive Slam

04:The Forgotten Experiments.description: Neldris bellows an arcane roar, inflicting up to 368,045 Arcane damage. Players farther from Neldris take less damage.\n
04:The Forgotten Experiments.title: Bellowing Roar

04:The Forgotten Experiments.description:
The experiment's melee attacks inflict 28,626 Arcane damage every 1 sec. This effect stacks.

Touching another player afflicted by |cffffffffInfused Strikes|r removes all applications and causes an |cffffffffInfused Explosion|r.
04:The Forgotten Experiments.title: Infused Strikes

04:The Forgotten Experiments.description: Thadrion spews forth arcane globules that inflict 286,257 Arcane damage to players within 7 yards of the impact locations.
04:The Forgotten Experiments.title: Volatile Spew

04:The Forgotten Experiments.description:
Thadrion erupts with energy, inflicting 61,341 Arcane damage to all players every 1 sec for 8 sec. 

|cffffffffErratic Remnant|rs react to the violent energy, inflicting 40,894 Arcane damage to all players every 1 sec during Violent Eruption.

|TInterface\EncounterJournal\UI-EJ-WarningTextIcon:0:0:0:0|t|CFF741A02In Heroic difficulty, Erratic Remnants inflict Arcane damage to all players during Violent Eruption.|r
04:The Forgotten Experiments.title: Violent Eruption

04:The Forgotten Experiments.description:
The experiment's melee attacks inflict 28,626 Arcane damage every 1 sec. This effect stacks.

Touching another player afflicted by |cffffffffInfused Strikes|r removes all applications and causes an |cffffffffInfused Explosion|r.
04:The Forgotten Experiments.title: Infused Strikes

04:The Forgotten Experiments.description: Rionthus takes in a deep breath and flies across the laboratory, spewing molten cinders that inflict 163,575 Volcanic damage every 0.5 sec for 1 sec to players in his path.
04:The Forgotten Experiments.title: Deep Breath

04:The Forgotten Experiments.description:
Rionthus tears into players with blasts of blue magic, inflicting 53,162 Spellfrost damage every 1 sec over 3 sec.

The magic lingers, slowing affected players by 30% and causing them to inflict 20,451 Spellfrost damage every 1 sec to players within 5 yards for 16 sec.
04:The Forgotten Experiments.title: Disintegrate

04:The Forgotten Experiments.description:
The experiment's melee attacks inflict 28,626 Arcane damage every 1 sec. This effect stacks.

Touching another player afflicted by |cffffffffInfused Strikes|r removes all applications and causes an |cffffffffInfused Explosion|r.
04:The Forgotten Experiments.title: Infused Strikes

04:The Forgotten Experiments.description: The energy from |cffffffffInfused Strikes|r explodes, inflicting 20,447 Arcane damage to all players and an additional 24,536 Arcane damage every 2 sec for 20 sec. This effect stacks.
04:The Forgotten Experiments.title: Infused Explosion

04:The Forgotten Experiments.description: The energy from |cffffffffInfused Strikes|r explodes, inflicting 20,447 Arcane damage to all players and an additional 24,536 Arcane damage every 2 sec for 20 sec. This effect stacks.
04:The Forgotten Experiments.title: Infused Explosion

04:The Forgotten Experiments.description: The energy from |cffffffffInfused Strikes|r explodes, inflicting 20,447 Arcane damage to all players and an additional 24,536 Arcane damage every 2 sec for 20 sec. This effect stacks.
04:The Forgotten Experiments.title: Infused Explosion

04:The Forgotten Experiments.description: Neldris charges between several players, inflicting 204,469 Physical damage to anyone in her path, knocking them back, and causing them to bleed for 20,447 Physical damage every 1 sec for 30 sec. This effect stacks.\n
04:The Forgotten Experiments.title: Rending Charge

04:The Forgotten Experiments.description: Rionthus creates a vortex of temporal energy that begins to drift toward him. If the anomaly collides with Rionthus, he gains a shield that absorbs damage equal to 15% of his maximum health.\n\nIf a player collides with the anomaly, it inflicts 102,234 Arcane damage and is knocked away.
04:The Forgotten Experiments.title: Temporal Anomaly

04:The Forgotten Experiments.description:
Thadrion infuses players with unstable energy, inflicting 8,179 Arcane damage every 2 sec and growing in intensity over time.

Upon removal, the energy briefly coalesces and then explodes, inflicting 286,257 Arcane damage to players within 12 yards and leaving behind an |cffffffffErratic Remnant|r.

A lingering trace of energy then jumps to a nearby player and applies Unstable Essence. 

|TInterface\EncounterJournal\UI-EJ-WarningTextIcon:0:0:0:0|t|CFF741A02In Heroic difficulty, an Erratic Remnant is formed when Unstable Essence is removed and Unstable Essence persists after Thadrion's demise.|r
04:The Forgotten Experiments.title: Unstable Essence

04:The Forgotten Experiments.description: The |cffffffffErratic Remnant|r periodically erupts with energy, inflicting 61,340 Arcane damage to all players.\n
04:The Forgotten Experiments.title: Erratic Burst

04:The Forgotten Experiments.description: $bullet;Neldris dashes between marked players with |cFF2959D3|Hspell:406358|h[Rending Charge]|h|r, affecting anyone in her path. \n$bullet;|cFF2959D3|Hspell:405042|h[Unstable Essence]|h|r creates an explosion upon removal and jumps to a nearby player.\n$bullet;Rionthus gains a shield that absorbs damage if |cFF2959D3|Hspell:407552|h[Temporal Anomalies]|h|r reach him.
04:The Forgotten Experiments.title: Damage Dealers

04:The Forgotten Experiments.description: $bullet;Neldris' |cFF2959D3|Hspell:406358|h[Rending Charge]|h|r inflicts heavy bleed damage on several targets.\n$bullet;|cFF2959D3|Hspell:405375|h[Violent Eruption]|h|r inflicts heavy damage to all players.\n$bullet;|cFF2959D3|Hspell:405042|h[Unstable Essence]|h|r creates an explosion upon removal and jumps to a nearby player.
04:The Forgotten Experiments.title: Healers

05:Assault of the Zaqali.description: As the battle begins, Warlord Kagni calls upon his Zaqali warband to assault the two protruding battlements. Warlord Kagni periodically sends himself onto the opposing battlement with |cFF2959D3|Hspell:408959|h[Devastating Leap]|h|r and causes |cFF2959D3|Hspell:400450|h[Cave Rubble]|h|r to fall with |cFF2959D3|Hspell:401258|h[Heavy Cudgel]|h|r.\n\nUpon reaching 25% remaining health, Warlord Kagni stages a final desparate assault on the Elder's Door with |cFF2959D3|Hspell:410535|h[Catastrophic Slams]|h|r.
05:Assault of the Zaqali.title: Overview

05:Assault of the Zaqali.description: $bullet; Warlord Kagni jumps between battlements periodically with |cFF2959D3|Hspell:398938|h[Devastating Leap]|h|r.\n$bullet; |cFF2959D3|Hspell:401258|h[Heavy Cudgel]|h|r causes massive Physical damage.\n$bullet; Zaqali forces arrive on each battlement simultaneously and trigger |cFF2959D3|Hspell:404687|h[Barrier Backfire]|h|r upon reaching the Elder's Door.
05:Assault of the Zaqali.title: Tanks

05:Assault of the Zaqali.description: $bullet; Warlord Kagni jumps between battlements periodically with |cFF2959D3|Hspell:398938|h[Devastating Leap]|h|r.\n$bullet; |cFF2959D3|Hspell:401258|h[Heavy Cudgel]|h|r causes |cFF2959D3|Hspell:400450|h[Cave Rubble]|h|r to drop onto the battlements.\n$bullet; Magma Mystics gain applications of |cFF2959D3|Hspell:409696|h[Molten Empowerment]|h|r while protected by |cFF2959D3|Hspell:397383|h[Molten Barrier]|h|r.
05:Assault of the Zaqali.title: Damage Dealers

05:Assault of the Zaqali.description: $bullet; |cFF2959D3|Hspell:401258|h[Heavy Cudgel]|h|r causes |cFF2959D3|Hspell:400450|h[Cave Rubble]|h|r to drop onto the battlements.\n$bullet; Obsidian Guards inflict damage while on each battlement with |cFF2959D3|Hspell:408620|h[Scorching Roar]|h|r.\n$bullet; Warlord Kagni inflicts massive damage with |cFF2959D3|Hspell:410535|h[Catastrophic Slam]|h|r.
05:Assault of the Zaqali.title: Healers

05:Assault of the Zaqali.description: The huntsman sets his aim on several players, heaving a |cffffffffBlazing Spear|r at their location that initially inflicts 102,312 Physical damage to players within 6 yards of the impact.\n\nThe |cffffffffBlazing Spear|r remains in the ground and after a short duration, explodes inflicting 196,290 Fire damage to players within 8 yards.
05:Assault of the Zaqali.title: Blazing Spear

05:Assault of the Zaqali.description: The Magma Mystic protects itself within a shield of lava that absorbs 3 million damage. The barrier pulses with flame while the shield holds, inflicting 40,894 Fire damage to all players every 4 sec and granting the mystic |cffffffffMolten Empowerment|r.
05:Assault of the Zaqali.title: Molten Barrier

05:Assault of the Zaqali.description: The Magma Mystic fires a searing bolt of lava, inflicting 49,073 Volcanic damage to the target.\n
05:Assault of the Zaqali.title: Lava Bolt

05:Assault of the Zaqali.description: Wallclimbers periodically ascend the rampart walls and attempt to breach the sealed door. Their melee attacks cause |cFF2959D3|Hspell:404687|h[Barrier Backfire]|h|r.
05:Assault of the Zaqali.title: Zaqali Wallclimber

05:Assault of the Zaqali.description: Warlord Kagni slams his massive cudgel in the direction of his current target, inflicting 408,939 Physical damage to players in a frontal cone and increasing their Physical damage taken by 15% for 45 sec. This effect stacks.\n\nThe force of the impact causes |cffffffffCave Rubble|r to fall.
05:Assault of the Zaqali.title: Heavy Cudgel

05:Assault of the Zaqali.description: At full energy, Warlord Kagni leaps between the battlements. When landing, he slams his hammer into the ground inflicting 245,363 Volcanic damage to players within 12 yards and knocking them away.\n\nMolten fissures radiate from the impact location, inflicting 81,788 Volcanic damage.
05:Assault of the Zaqali.title: Devastating Leap

05:Assault of the Zaqali.description: The caster hurls lava at random players, inflicting 40,913 Lava damage on impact and an additonal 24,536 Lava damage every 3 sec for 15 sec.
05:Assault of the Zaqali.title: Magma Flow

05:Assault of the Zaqali.description: Warlord Kagni drains Ignara's life, regaining 35% of his maximum health and gaining |cffffffffIgnara's Fury|r.
05:Assault of the Zaqali.title: Desperate Immolation

05:Assault of the Zaqali.description: Warlord Kagni smolders with Ignara's flame, periodically inflicting 38,903 Fire damage to all players every 1.5 sec.
05:Assault of the Zaqali.title: Ignara's Fury

05:Assault of the Zaqali.description: Warlord Kagni slams his massive cudgel in the direction of his current target, inflicting 408,939 Physical damage to players in a frontal cone and increasing their Physical damage taken by 15% for 45 sec. This effect stacks. \n\nThe force of the impact causes all players to erupt in flame, inflicting 202,743 Fire damage to targets within 6 yards of their location.
05:Assault of the Zaqali.title: Flaming Cudgel

05:Assault of the Zaqali.description: The impact of Kagni's charge weakens the player increasing their damage taken from |cffffffffCatastrophic Slam|r by 200%.
05:Assault of the Zaqali.title: Weakened Vitality

05:Assault of the Zaqali.description:
Upon reaching 100 energy, Warlord Kagni sends a devastating shockwave toward the Elder's Door, inflicting 1.2 million Physical damage split evenly among players in its path and applying |cffffffffWeakened Vitality|r.

Warlord Kagni expends up to 100 energy, reduced by the number of players hit. If any energy remains, |cffffffffCatastrophic Slam|r triggers a |cffffffffBarrier Backfire|r.

|TInterface\EncounterJournal\UI-EJ-WarningTextIcon:0:0:0:0|t|CFF741A02In Heroic difficulty, Catastrophic Slam causes Weakened Vitality.|r
05:Assault of the Zaqali.title: Catastrophic Slam

05:Assault of the Zaqali.description: The Obsidian Guard unleashes a burning roar that sears players within 25 yards, inflicting 40,894 Fire damage every 0.5 sec for 1.5 sec.
05:Assault of the Zaqali.title: Scorching Roar

05:Assault of the Zaqali.description: The Obsidian Guard charges its shield with lava, then fires a beam of magma towards its target, inflicting 196,290 Volcanic damage to players in the path of the beam.
05:Assault of the Zaqali.title: Volcanic Shield

05:Assault of the Zaqali.description: Siege Arbalests fire bolts along the ramparts inflicting 163,575 Physical damage to all players within 12 yards of the impact.
05:Assault of the Zaqali.title: Arbalest Fire

05:Assault of the Zaqali.description: Rubble falls from the cavern's ceiling, inflicting 327,151 Physical damage to players within 6 yards of the impact locations.
05:Assault of the Zaqali.title: Cave Rubble

05:Assault of the Zaqali.description: The Elder's Door is protected by a runic barrier that backfires when attacked by Zaqali forces, inflicting 306,704 Shadowflame damage to all players and an additional 32,715 Shadowflame damage every 0.5 sec. This effect stacks.\n\n|TInterface\EncounterJournal\UI-EJ-WarningTextIcon:0:0:0:0|t|CFF741A02In Heroic difficulty, Barrier Backfire does not expire.|r
05:Assault of the Zaqali.title: Barrier Backfire

05:Assault of the Zaqali.description: Increases the Magma Mystic's fire damage by 20%. This effect stacks.
05:Assault of the Zaqali.title: Molten Empowerment

06:Rashok, the Elder.description: Rashok's energy is being drained by the Elder's Conduit, causing a series of violent reactions in the chamber.
06:Rashok, the Elder.title: Elder's Conduit

06:Rashok, the Elder.description: Shadowflame energy erupts from Rashok's body as he is drained, inflicting 408,135 Shadowflame damage to players within 5 yards of the impact location.
06:Rashok, the Elder.title: Shadowflame Fissures

06:Rashok, the Elder.description:
Rashok leaps toward a target player and slams the ground, creating a |cffffffffLava Vortex|r at that location and inflicting 163,575 Fire damage to all players. This damage is increased by 20% for each |cffffffffLava Vortex|r in the chamber.

The slam's impact causes each |cffffffffLava Vortex|r to pour forth |cffffffffLava Wave|r.

A |cffffffffLava Explosion|r erupts if |cffffffffSearing Slam|r hits a |cffffffffLava Vortex|r.
06:Rashok, the Elder.title: Searing Slam

06:Rashok, the Elder.description: Rashok unleashes a blast of shadowlava from Djaruun, inflicting 1 million Shadowflame damage to players in a frontal cone.
06:Rashok, the Elder.title: Shadowlava Blast

06:Rashok, the Elder.description: Rashok launches a barrage of shadowflame missiles across the chamber. Each missile inflicts 122,614 Shadowflame damage to players within 5 yards of its impact location and an additional 61,341 Shadowflame damage every 1 sec for 8 sec. This effect stacks.\n\nEach missile that fails to hit a player erupts, inflicting 122,614 Shadowflame damage to all players.
06:Rashok, the Elder.title: Doom Flames

06:Rashok, the Elder.description: Upon reaching 100 energy, Rashok becomes immune to the Elder's Conduit and overloads with pulsing flame, inflicting 613,408 Shadowflame damage to all players every 1 sec.
06:Rashok, the Elder.title: Ancient Fury

06:Rashok, the Elder.description: Rashok roars in pain, inflicting 20,447 Shadowflame damage to all players as he breaks free from the |cffffffffElder's Conduit|r.\n\nRashok's inner flame smolders as he breaks free from his prison, increasing the damage of |cffffffffScorching Heatwave|r by 500%.
06:Rashok, the Elder.title: Smoldering Rage

06:Rashok, the Elder.description: Rashok slashes at his current target, inflicting 817,877 Fire damage and increasing damage taken by |cffffffffFlaming Slash|r by 3,000% for 6 sec.\n
06:Rashok, the Elder.title: Flaming Slash

06:Rashok, the Elder.description: Rashok crushes his current target, inflicting 2 million Physical damage and increasing damage taken by  |cffffffffEarthen Crush|r by 3,000% for 6 sec.
06:Rashok, the Elder.title: Earthen Crush

06:Rashok, the Elder.description: Rashok gradually gains energy over time while outside the Elder's Conduit. At 100 energy, Rashok gains |cFF2959D3|Hspell:405316|h[Ancient Fury]|h|r and begins to pulse deadly Shadowflame damage.\n\nRashok's powerful |cFF2959D3|Hspell:405821|h[Searing Slam]|h|r creates a |cFF2959D3|Hspell:406160|h[Lava Vortex]|h|r which pours forth |cFF2959D3|Hspell:403556|h[Lava Wave]|h|r across the chamber.

$bullet; Rashok gains |cFF2959D3|Hspell:405316|h[Ancient Fury]|h|r at 100 energy and begins to pulse deadly Shadowflame to all players.\n$bullet; Rashok is incapacitated and gradually loses energy while inside the |cFF2959D3|Hspell:401419|h[Elder's Conduit]|h|r.\n$bullet; Rashok executes a series of deadly attacks during |cFF2959D3|Hspell:407641|h[Wrath of Djaruun]|h|r.
06:Rashok, the Elder.title: Tank

06:Rashok, the Elder.description: $bullet;|cFF2959D3|Hspell:405821|h[Searing Slam]|h|r creates a |cFF2959D3|Hspell:406160|h[Lava Vortex]|h|r at the impact location.\n$bullet;|cFF2959D3|Hspell:406152|h[Doom Flames]|h|r inflict massive Shadowflame damage to all players if it fails to hit at least one player.
06:Rashok, the Elder.title: Damage Dealers

06:Rashok, the Elder.description: $bullet;Rashok inflicts heavy damage to all players with |cFF2959D3|Hspell:404445|h[Scorching Heatwave]|h|r while inside the |cFF2959D3|Hspell:401419|h[Elder's Conduit]|h|r.\n$bullet;|cFF2959D3|Hspell:405821|h[Searing Slam]|h|r inflicts more damage each time it's cast.
06:Rashok, the Elder.title: Healers

06:Rashok, the Elder.description: Rashok unleashes a powerful combination of attacks with Djaruun, Pillar of the Elder Flame, at his current target.
06:Rashok, the Elder.title: Wrath of Djaruun

06:Rashok, the Elder.description: The |cffffffffLava Vortex|r explodes if hit by |cffffffffSearing Slam|r, inflicting 204,469 Fire damage to all players every 1 sec for 10 sec.\n
06:Rashok, the Elder.title: Lava Explosion

06:Rashok, the Elder.description:
Rashok smashes the ground with the Shadowflame-infused Djaruun, inflicting 2.2 million Shadowflame damage split evenly among players within 10 yards of the impact location. All players are afflicted with |cffffffffOvercharged|r.

Rashok gains up to 15 energy, reduced by the number of players hit.

|TInterface\EncounterJournal\UI-EJ-WarningTextIcon:0:0:0:0|t|CFF741A02In Heroic difficulty, all players are afflicted by Overcharged.
06:Rashok, the Elder.title: Charged Smash

06:Rashok, the Elder.description: After draining Rashok's energy 2 times, the conduit shatters, inflicting 204,469 Shadowflame damage to all players within 20 yards and becomes unusable.
06:Rashok, the Elder.title: Shattered Conduit

06:Rashok, the Elder.description: Scalding vortex of lava that inflicts 102,235 Fire damage every 2 sec to players within the area. Pours forth |cffffffffLava Wave|r .\n\n|TInterface\EncounterJournal\UI-EJ-WarningTextIcon:0:0:0:0|t|CFF741A02In Heroic difficulty and above, Lava Vortexes erupt with Lava Waves more frequently.
06:Rashok, the Elder.title: Lava Vortex

06:Rashok, the Elder.description: A roiling wave of lava that inflicts 204,469 Fire damage every 1 sec to players within the area.
06:Rashok, the Elder.title: Lava Wave

06:Rashok, the Elder.description: Rashok periodically emits scorching heat as his energy is drained by the |cffffffffElder's Conduit|r, inflicting 110,413 Shadowflame damage to all players and applying |cffffffffScorched Flesh|r.\n\n|TInterface\EncounterJournal\UI-EJ-WarningTextIcon:0:0:0:0|t|CFF741A02In Heroic difficulty and above, also afflicts all players with Scorched Flesh.
06:Rashok, the Elder.title: Scorching Heatwave

06:Rashok, the Elder.description: Each |cffffffffScorching Heatwave|r sears players' flesh, increasing damage taken from |cffffffffScorching Heatwave|r by 2%. This effect stacks.
06:Rashok, the Elder.title: Scorched Flesh

06:Rashok, the Elder.description: Volatile energy lingers on the player, inflicting 16,358 Shadowflame damage every 1 sec for 30 sec.
06:Rashok, the Elder.title: Overcharged

07:The Vigilant Steward, Zskarn.description: A master at manipulating the battlefield, Zskarn utilizes several deadly traps to test the capabilities of players. Zskarn creates Dragonfire Golems to aide him by activating nearby |cFF2959D3|Hspell:405462|h[Dragonfire Traps]|h|r to burn players in the vicinity. \n\nZskarn passively generates energy, and upon reaching 100 energy unleashes waves of |cFF2959D3|Hspell:405439|h[Tactical Destruction]|h|r from nearby Dragon Statues to decimate players.
07:The Vigilant Steward, Zskarn.title: Section 1

07:The Vigilant Steward, Zskarn.description: $bullet; |cFF2959D3|Hspell:406202|h[Tactical Destruction]|h|r unleashes multiple waves of Dragonfire from nearby dragon statues that are lethal to players caught within.\n$bullet; |cFF2959D3|Hspell:404942|h[Searing Claws]|h|r inflicts increasing Fire damage to Zskarn's current target with each swing.\n$bullet; |cFF2959D3|Hspell:404955|h[Shrapnel Bomb]|h|r inflicts massive Physical damage to all players if not dealt with in time.
07:The Vigilant Steward, Zskarn.title: Tanks

07:The Vigilant Steward, Zskarn.description: $bullet; |cFF2959D3|Hspell:406202|h[Tactical Destruction]|h|r unleashes multiple waves of Dragonfire from nearby dragon statues that are lethal to players caught within.\n$bullet; |cFF2959D3|Hspell:403978|h[Blast Wave]|h|r inflicts heavy Fire damage and knocks players back.\n$bullet; Dragonfire Golems attempt to activate additional |cFF2959D3|Hspell:405462|h[Dragonfire Traps]|h|r.
07:The Vigilant Steward, Zskarn.title: Damage Dealers

07:The Vigilant Steward, Zskarn.description: $bullet; |cFF2959D3|Hspell:406202|h[Tactical Destruction]|h|r unleashes multiple waves of Dragonfire from nearby dragon statues that are lethal to players caught within.\n$bullet; |cFF2959D3|Hspell:403978|h[Blast Wave]|h|r inflicts heavy Fire damage and knocks players back.\n$bullet; |cFF2959D3|Hspell:404007|h[Unstable Embers]|h|r inflicts high damage to several players and causes them to damage nearby allies.
07:The Vigilant Steward, Zskarn.title: Healers

07:The Vigilant Steward, Zskarn.description: Zskarn animates several Dragonfire Golems to assist him by seeking out and activating inactive Dragonfire Traps.
07:The Vigilant Steward, Zskarn.title: Animate Golems

07:The Vigilant Steward, Zskarn.description: Dragonfire Golems attempt to activate inactive Dragonfire Traps. \n\nIf no inactive Dragonfire Traps are detected, Dragonfire Golems assist Zskarn to eliminate players.
07:The Vigilant Steward, Zskarn.title: Activate Dragonfire Trap

07:The Vigilant Steward, Zskarn.description: Rummage through a defeated Dragonfire Golem's parts, searching for a way to disable Dragonfire Traps.
07:The Vigilant Steward, Zskarn.title: Salvage Parts

07:The Vigilant Steward, Zskarn.description: Deactivate the targeted active Dragonfire Trap.
07:The Vigilant Steward, Zskarn.title: Deactivate Dragonfire Trap

07:The Vigilant Steward, Zskarn.description: Zskarn unleashes a |cffffffffBlast Wave|r that knocks all players back, inflicting 122,682 Fire damage on impact and an additional 20,447 Fire damage every 0.5 sec for 9 sec.
07:The Vigilant Steward, Zskarn.title: Blast Wave

07:The Vigilant Steward, Zskarn.description: Zskarn covers targets in |cffffffffUnstable Embers|r, inflicting 57,251 Fire damage every 1 sec for 10 sec.\n\nPlayers afflicted by |cffffffffUnstable Embers|r inflict 57,251 Fire damage to allies within 5 yards every 1 sec for 10 sec.
07:The Vigilant Steward, Zskarn.title: Unstable Embers

07:The Vigilant Steward, Zskarn.description: After 30 seconds |cffffffffShrapnel Bomb|r detonates inflicting 327,151 Physical damage and an additional 81,788 Physical damage every 1 sec for 10 sec to all players.\n\nTriggering a |cffffffffShrapnel Bomb|r early instead causes a localized detonation, inflicting 715,642 Physical damage to the player that triggered the detonation and an additional 81,788 Physical damage every 1 sec for 8 sec.
07:The Vigilant Steward, Zskarn.title: Shrapnel Bomb

07:The Vigilant Steward, Zskarn.description: Zskarn's claws burn his current target, inflicting 24,536 Fire damage every 2 sec for 20 sec. This effect stacks.
07:The Vigilant Steward, Zskarn.title: Searing Claws

07:The Vigilant Steward, Zskarn.description: Upon reaching 100 energy, Zskarn unleashes a series of rapid eruptions from nearby dragon statues, inflicting 1 million Fire damage to all players caught within the blast.
07:The Vigilant Steward, Zskarn.title: Tactical Destruction

07:The Vigilant Steward, Zskarn.description: Zskarn activates several nearby |cffffffffDragonfire Traps|r that inflict 51,117 Fire damage every 1 sec for 6 sec to all players within 10 yards of the trap. This effect stacks.
07:The Vigilant Steward, Zskarn.title: Dragonfire Traps

08:Magmorax.description: Magmorax launches |cFF2959D3|Hspell:402989|h[Molten Spittle]|h|r at players' locations that form |cFF2959D3|Hspell:403103|h[Magma Puddles]|h|r on impact. While Magmorax stands within a puddle, he gains |cFF2959D3|Hspell:407879|h[Blazing Tantrum]|h|r.\n\nOver the course of the fight, Magmorax gains molten energy. Upon reaching 100 energy, Magmorax unleashes |cFF2959D3|Hspell:408358|h[Catastrophic Eruption]|h|r, destroying all in his domain.
08:Magmorax.title: Overview

08:Magmorax.description: $bullet; Magmorax enters a |cFF2959D3|Hspell:407879|h[Blazing Tantrum]|h|r when within a |cFF2959D3|Hspell:403103|h[Magma Puddle]|h|r.\n$bullet; |cFF2959D3|Hspell:403103|h[Magma Puddle]|h|r continues to grow over time.\n$bullet; |cFF2959D3|Hspell:401348|h[Incinerating Maws]|h|r inflict heavy damage on his current target and increases the damage taken from subsequent attacks of |cFF2959D3|Hspell:401348|h[Incinerating Maws]|h|r.
08:Magmorax.title: Tanks

08:Magmorax.description: $bullet; |cFF2959D3|Hspell:402989|h[Molten Spittle]|h|r creates a |cFF2959D3|Hspell:403103|h[Magma Puddle]|h|r at multiple players' locations.\n$bullet; |cFF2959D3|Hspell:403103|h[Magma Puddle]|h|r continues to grow over time.\n$bullet; |cFF2959D3|Hspell:413351|h[Lava Ejection]|h|r inflicts massive Fire damage to all players and leaves a |cFF2959D3|Hspell:403103|h[Magma Puddle]|h|r behind if it fails to hit at least one player.
08:Magmorax.title: Damage Dealers

08:Magmorax.description: Magmorax roars, inflicting 143,128 Fire damage on impact and an additional 3,680 Fire damage every 1 sec to all players. This effect stacks.\n\nAdditionally, Magmorax expels numerous |cffffffffLava Ejection|rs into the chamber.
08:Magmorax.title: Igniting Roar

08:Magmorax.description: Magmorax spews lava in a frontal cone, inflicting 327,151 Fire damage to all players caught in his breath.
08:Magmorax.title: Blazing Breath

08:Magmorax.description: Magmorax's heads bite at his current target. Each attack inflicts 286,257 Physical damage and an additional 49,073 Fire damage every 1.5 sec for 30 sec. This effect also increases the damage taken from subsequent |cffffffffIncinerating Maws|r taken by 50% for 30 sec. This effect stacks.
08:Magmorax.title: Incinerating Maws

08:Magmorax.description: Magmorax stomps the ground, inflicting 163,575 Physical damage to all players and knocking them back.
08:Magmorax.title: Overpowering Stomp

08:Magmorax.description: Upon reaching 100 energy, Magmorax erupts into flame, increasing Physical damage done by 150%. \n\nThe explosion inflicts 122,682 Fire damage to all players every 2 sec and increases Fire damage taken by 50%. This effect stacks.
08:Magmorax.title: Catastrophic Eruption

08:Magmorax.description: Magmorax covers random players in fiery spit, inflicting 81,788 Fire damage every 1.5 sec for 6 sec. \n\nUpon removal the player explodes, inflicting 122,682 Fire damage to players within 10 yards and creating a |cffffffffMagma Puddle|r.
08:Magmorax.title: Molten Spittle

08:Magmorax.description:
A pool of magma that continues to grow during the course of the fight. Players standing in the pool ignite with |cffffffffSearing Heat|r, shrinking the pool over time.

In addition, Magmorax entering a pool causes him to erupt into a |cffffffffBlazing Tantrum|r.
08:Magmorax.title: Magma Puddle

08:Magmorax.description:
|cffffffffMagma Puddle|rs set players within the area ablaze, inflicting 7,361 Fire damage every 1 sec for 15 sec. This effect stacks.

Upon reaching 25 applications, the player is |cffffffffIncinerated|r.

|TInterface\EncounterJournal\UI-EJ-WarningTextIcon:0:0:0:0|t|CFF741A02On Heroic difficulty, players are Incinerated upon reaching 25 applications of Searing Heat. |r
08:Magmorax.title: Searing Heat

08:Magmorax.description: While standing within a |cffffffffMagma Puddle|r, Magmorax gains 5 energy and inflicts 40,894 Fire damage to all players every 1 sec.
08:Magmorax.title: Blazing Tantrum

08:Magmorax.description: $bullet; |cFF2959D3|Hspell:408839|h[Searing Heat]|h|r inflicts increasing damage to players standing within a |cFF2959D3|Hspell:403103|h[Magma Puddle]|h|r.\n$bullet; |cFF2959D3|Hspell:403103|h[Magma Puddle]|h|r continues to grow over time.\n$bullet; Magmorax inflicts increasing Fire damage with every |cFF2959D3|Hspell:403740|h[Igniting Roar]|h|r.
08:Magmorax.title: Healers

08:Magmorax.description: Upon reaching 25 stacks of |cffffffffSearing Heat|r, the player is incinerated, suffering 4 million Fire damage. \n
08:Magmorax.title: Incinerated

08:Magmorax.description: Magmorax expels globs of burning magma onto the ground. Each glob of magma inflicts 81,788 Fire damage to players within 4 yards of the impact location, increasing damage taken from |cffffffffLava Ejection|r by 150% for 1 min.\n\nEach glob that fails to hit a player explodes, inflicting 204,469 Fire damage to all players and leaving a |cffffffffMagma Puddle|r behind.
08:Magmorax.title: Lava Ejection

09:Echo of Neltharion.description:
The Echo of Neltharion periodically raises walls of |cFF2959D3|Hspell:402902|h[Twisted Earth]|h|r throughout the chamber. As the battle begins, Neltharion causes |cFF2959D3|Hspell:402115|h[Echoing Fissures]|h|r to erupt in the newly confined space.

Upon reaching 60% remaining health, Neltharion |cFF2959D3|Hspell:403057|h[Surrenders to Corruption]|h|r, summoning Voices From Beyond throughout the chamber.

Once all Voices From Beyond are slain, Neltharion begins to rip open portals to overwhelm players with Twisted Abberations and the might of his |cFF2959D3|Hspell:407917|h[Ebon Destruction]|h|r.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Overview

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: $bullet; |cFF2959D3|Hspell:401022|h[Calamitous Strike]|h|r greatly increases players' damage taken.\n$bullet; |cFF2959D3|Hspell:407790|h[Sunder Shadow]|h|r inflicts Physical damage and leaves players' corporeal bodies vulnerable to |cFF2959D3|Hspell:407856|h[Shadow Strike]|h|r.\n$bullet; |cFF2959D3|Hspell:401022|h[Calamitous Strike]|h|r and |cFF2959D3|Hspell:407790|h[Sunder Shadow]|h|r knock players back with enough force to destroy |cFF2959D3|Hspell:402902|h[Twisted Earth]|h|r.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Tanks

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: $bullet; |cFF2959D3|Hspell:407221|h[Rushing Darkness]|h|r knocks players backwards with enough force to destroy |cFF2959D3|Hspell:402902|h[Twisted Earth]|h|r.\n$bullet; Neltharion protects himself with |cFF2959D3|Hspell:403049|h[Shadow Barrier]|h|r upon reaching 35% health if any Voices From Beyond remain.\n$bullet; Twisted Aberrations periodically emerge from the portals created by |cFF2959D3|Hspell:403908|h[Sunder Reality]|h|r.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Damage Dealers

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: $bullet; |cFF2959D3|Hspell:401022|h[Calamitous Strike]|h|r greatly increases players' damage taken.\n$bullet; Players hit by |cFF2959D3|Hspell:407790|h[Sunder Shadow]|h|r, are vulnerable just before |cFF2959D3|Hspell:407856|h[Shadow Strike]|h|r.\n$bullet; |cFF2959D3|Hspell:401825|h[Shatter]|h|r inflicts damage to all players each time a wall is shattered.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Healers

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: Neltharion strikes his current target with his massive blade, inflicting 490,726 Physical damage and knocking them away. Increases Physical damage taken by 200% for 40 sec.\n\nColliding with a segment of |cffffffffTwisted Earth|r causes it to |cffffffffShatter|r.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Calamitous Strike

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: Neltharion blasts several players for 122,682 Shadow damage and knocks them away, inflicting an additional 122,682 Shadow damage to any players between Neltharion and his targets and silencing them for 3 sec.\n\nColliding with a segment of |cffffffffTwisted Earth|r causes it to |cffffffffShatter|r.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Rushing Darkness

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: Neltharion surrenders to darkness, inflicting 40,894 Shadow damage to all players every 1 sec. and a final burst of 122,682 Shadow damage as the channel ends.\n\nNeltharion afflicts several players with |cffffffffCorruption|r.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Surrender to Corruption

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: Neltharion draws in dark power to annihilate players, inflicting 102,235 Shadow damage to all players. Each cast increases damage done by |cffffffffUmbral Annihilation|r by 100%. This effect stacks.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Umbral Annihilation

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: Neltharion shatters the ground beneath him, inflicting 1.2 million Volcanic damage players within 24 yards of the impact, and an additional 123,000 Volcanic damage to all other players. The effect echoes at each previous location when |cffffffffEchoing Fissure|r is cast. \n\nEach cast causes |cffffffffCollapsed Earth|r and spreads |cffffffffSeeping Lava|r.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Echoing Fissure

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: Neltharion strikes his current target with his massive blade, inflicting 490,726 Physical damage and knocking them away. Increases Physical damage taken by 200% for 40 sec.\n\nColliding with a segment of |cffffffffTwisted Earth|r causes it to |cffffffffShatter|r.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Calamitous Strike

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: Neltharion rips nearby |cffffffffTwisted Earth|r into portals to the void realm, inflicting 204,444 Shadow damage to players in 5 yards of the impact. The portal continuously allows Twisted Aberrations into reality.\n\nPlayers standing in portals gain |cffffffffSundered Reality|r.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Sunder Reality

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: Neltharion raises walls of earth from the chamber's floor, causing |cffffffffVolcanic Blast|r where they emerge.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Twisted Earth

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: The erupting segment of |cffffffffTwisted Earth|r inflicts 204,469 Volcanic damage to players in 7 yards, and knocks them away.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Volcanic Blast

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: Impacting a segment of |cffffffffTwisted Earth|r shatters it, inflicting 61,341 Physical damage to the impacting player. Fragments burst from the impact, inflicting 20,447 Physical damage to all players every 1 sec. for 14 sec. This effect stacks.\n\nPelts the chamber with |cffffffffShattered Rock|r.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Shatter

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: Impacting a segment of |cffffffffTwisted Earth|r shatters it, inflicting 61,341 Physical damage to the impacting player. Fragments burst from the impact, inflicting 20,447 Physical damage to all players every 1 sec. for 14 sec. This effect stacks.\n\nPelts the chamber with |cffffffffShattered Rock|r.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Shatter

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: The Voice from Beyond empowers Neltharion with dark power, allowing him to cast |cffffffffShadow Barrier|r upon reaching 35% remaining health.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Empower Shadows

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: Neltharion blasts several players for 122,682 Shadow damage and knocks them away, inflicting an additional 122,682 Shadow damage to any players between Neltharion and his targets and silencing them for 3 sec.\n\nColliding with a segment of |cffffffffTwisted Earth|r causes it to |cffffffffShatter|r.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Rushing Darkness

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: Impacting a segment of |cffffffffTwisted Earth|r shatters it, inflicting 61,341 Physical damage to the impacting player. Fragments burst from the impact, inflicting 20,447 Physical damage to all players every 1 sec. for 14 sec. This effect stacks.\n\nPelts the chamber with |cffffffffShattered Rock|r.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Shatter

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: Neltharion draws upon his might and blasts all players for 2 million Volcanic damage, and an additional 102,235 Fire damage every 1.5 sec. for 15 sec.\n\nThis power dispels any |cffffffffSundered Reality|r near players.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Ebon Destruction

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: Impacting a segment of |cffffffffTwisted Earth|r shatters it, inflicting 61,341 Physical damage to the impacting player. Fragments burst from the impact, inflicting 20,447 Physical damage to all players every 1 sec. for 14 sec. This effect stacks.\n\nPelts the chamber with |cffffffffShattered Rock|r.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Shatter

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: Neltharion sunders his current target's shadow from their body, inflicting 736,089 Physical damage. Neltharion immediately attacks the target's body with |cffffffffShadow Strike|r.\n\nWhile in control of their shadow, the target is incorporeal and can move through |cffffffffTwisted Earth|r.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Sunder Shadow

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: Neltharion strikes the player's body while they are incorporeal, inflicting 204,469 Physical damage to the body and hurtling it towards the player. The player rejoins their body and receives its missing health as Shadow damage. Increases damage taken from |cffffffffSunder Shadow|r by 300% for 40 sec.\n\nThe player's body colliding with a segment of |cffffffffTwisted Earth|r causes it to |cffffffffShatter|r.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Shadow Strike

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: Impacting a segment of |cffffffffTwisted Earth|r shatters it, inflicting 61,341 Physical damage to the impacting player. Fragments burst from the impact, inflicting 20,447 Physical damage to all players every 1 sec. for 14 sec. This effect stacks.\n\nPelts the chamber with |cffffffffShattered Rock|r.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Shatter

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: Rock fragments inflict 102,235 Nature damage to players standing at the impact location.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Shattered Rock

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: Rock fragments inflict 102,235 Nature damage to players standing at the impact location.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Shattered Rock

09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Shattered Rock

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: Rock fragments inflict 102,235 Nature damage to players standing at the impact location.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Shattered Rock

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: Lava seeps out from each |cffffffffEchoing Fissure|r, inflicting 184,022 Volcanic damage every 1.5 sec. to players within the area.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Seeping Lava

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: Neltharion raises walls of earth from the chamber's floor, causing |cffffffffVolcanic Blast|r where they emerge.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Twisted Earth

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: The erupting segment of |cffffffffTwisted Earth|r inflicts 204,469 Volcanic damage to players in 7 yards, and knocks them away.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Volcanic Blast

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: Neltharion causes any remaining |cffffffffTwisted Earth|r to erupt with a |cffffffffVolcanic Blast|r and |cffffffffCollapsed Earth|r to fall.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Raze the Earth

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: Neltharion infuses players with volcanic energy that explodes after 7 sec, inflicting 511,173 Volcanic damage to players within 15 yards, and an additional 81,751 Volcanic damage every 1.5 sec for 15 sec.\n\nThis effect stacks.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Volcanic Heart

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: Neltharion infuses players with volcanic energy that explodes after 7 sec, inflicting 511,173 Volcanic damage to players within 15 yards, and an additional 81,751 Volcanic damage every 1.5 sec for 15 sec.\n\nThis effect stacks.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Volcanic Heart

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: Neltharion blasts several players for 122,682 Shadow damage and knocks them away, inflicting an additional 122,682 Shadow damage to any players between Neltharion and his targets and silencing them for 3 sec.\n\nColliding with a segment of |cffffffffTwisted Earth|r causes it to |cffffffffShatter|r.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Rushing Darkness

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: Rubble falls from the ceiling, inflicting 163,575 Nature damage to players within 3 yards and stunning them for 1 sec.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Collapsed Earth

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: The erupting segment of |cffffffffTwisted Earth|r inflicts 204,469 Volcanic damage to players in 7 yards, and knocks them away.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Volcanic Blast

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: Rubble falls from the ceiling, inflicting 163,575 Nature damage to players within 3 yards and stunning them for 1 sec.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Collapsed Earth

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: Portals distort reality for nearby players, inflicting 102,247 Shadow damage every 1.5 sec. to players within the area, reducing their damage done by 99%, and reducing damage taken from |cffffffffEbon Destruction|r by 99%.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Sundered Reality

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: Neltharion shields himself in darkness, reducing damage taken by 99%.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Shadow Barrier

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: Impacting a segment of |cffffffffTwisted Earth|r shatters it, inflicting 61,341 Physical damage to the impacting player. Fragments burst from the impact, inflicting 20,447 Physical damage to all players every 1 sec. for 14 sec. This effect stacks.\n\nPelts the chamber with |cffffffffShattered Rock|r.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Shatter

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: Rock fragments inflict 102,235 Nature damage to players standing at the impact location.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Shattered Rock

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: Rock fragments inflict 102,235 Nature damage to players standing at the impact location.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Shattered Rock

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: Twisted Aberrations hunger for flesh, endlessly hunting down life to shred and devour with their razor sharp claws and teeth.\n\n|TInterface\EncounterJournal\UI-EJ-WarningTextIcon:0:0:0:0|t|CFF741A02In Heroic difficulty, Twisted Aberrations grow continuously stronger from |cFF2959D3|Hspell:409876|h[Unstable Mutation.]|h|r
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Twisted Aberration

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: Twisted Aberrations continuously mutate, increasing damage done by 75% every 2 sec.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Unstable Mutation

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: Neltharion's corruption seeps into players' soul, turning them hostile to allies but allowing them to attack creatures |cffffffffHidden in Void|r for 30 sec.\n\nBreaking the shield of a Voice From Beyond |cffffffffHidden in Void|r clears |cffffffffCorruption|r from all players.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Corruption

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: The Voice From Beyond shrouds itself in shadow, absorbing 491,513 damage and concealing itself from players unaffected by |cffffffffCorruption|r while the shield holds. When the shield breaks, the Voice From Beyond begins casting |cffffffffRuptured Veil|r.\n\n|TInterface\EncounterJournal\UI-EJ-WarningTextIcon:0:0:0:0|t|CFF741A02In Heroic difficulty, Voices From Beyond Hidden in Void can only be attacked by players afflicted by Corruption.|r
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Hidden in Void

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: The Voice From Beyond ruptures the veil of reality, inflicting 61,341 Shadow damage to all players every 4 sec. until slain.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Ruptured Veil

09:Echo of Neltharion.description: Rubble periodically falls from the damaged ceiling, inflicting 204,469 Volcanic damage to players within 3 yards.
09:Echo of Neltharion.title: Crumbling Facade

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description:
Scalecommander Sarkareth begins the fight with |cFF2959D3|Hspell:401383|h[Oppressing Howl]|h|r and attempts to obliterate players with |cFF2959D3|Hspell:401810|h[Glittering Surge]|h|r.

When weakened, he draws upon the power of the Void to enhance his draconic powers, using |cFF2959D3|Hspell:404456|h[Abyssal Breath]|h|r and |cFF2959D3|Hspell:404269|h[Ebon Might]|h|r to summon and strengthen images of himself.

When severely wounded, Sarkareth destroys the room to fully draw in powers of the Void and convert his abilities to their most powerful forms.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Overview

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description:
$bullet;|cFF2959D3|Hspell:401340|h[Blazing Blast]|h|r inflicts damage to the raid based on the total Fire damage taken from |cFF2959D3|Hspell:401325|h[Burning Claws]|h|r over its duration.
$bullet;When Sarkareth uses |cFF2959D3|Hspell:401810|h[Glittering Surge]|h|r, it applies |cFF2959D3|Hspell:401905|h[Dazzled]|h|r to all players who still have |cFF2959D3|Hspell:401383|h[Oppressing Howl]|h|r.
$bullet;|cFF2959D3|Hspell:404456|h[Abyssal Breath]|h|r creates temporal images of Sarkareth, which then gain power over time from |cFF2959D3|Hspell:404269|h[Ebon Might]|h|r.
$bullet;|cFF2959D3|Hspell:403625|h[Scouring Eternity]|h|r inflicts lethal damage to players not safely hidden behind an |cFF2959D3|Hspell:403497|h[Astral Formation]|h|r.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Tanks

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description:
$bullet;When Sarkareth uses |cFF2959D3|Hspell:401810|h[Glittering Surge]|h|r, it applies |cFF2959D3|Hspell:401905|h[Dazzled]|h|r to all players who still have |cFF2959D3|Hspell:401383|h[Oppressing Howl]|h|r.
$bullet;|cFF2959D3|Hspell:404027|h[Void Bomb]|h|r erupts for high raid damage unless detonated within the |cFF2959D3|Hspell:401215|h[Emptiness Between Stars]|h|r.
$bullet;|cFF2959D3|Hspell:404456|h[Abyssal Breath]|h|r creates temporal images of Sarkareth, which then gain power over time from |cFF2959D3|Hspell:404269|h[Ebon Might]|h|r.
$bullet;|cFF2959D3|Hspell:403625|h[Scouring Eternity]|h|r inflicts lethal damage to players not safely hidden behind an |cFF2959D3|Hspell:403497|h[Astral Formation]|h|r.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Damage Dealers

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: $bullet;When Sarkareth uses |cFF2959D3|Hspell:401810|h[Glittering Surge]|h|r, it applies |cFF2959D3|Hspell:401905|h[Dazzled]|h|r to all players who still have |cFF2959D3|Hspell:401383|h[Oppressing Howl]|h|r.\n$bullet;|cFF2959D3|Hspell:404027|h[Void Bomb]|h|r erupts for high raid damage unless detonated within the |cFF2959D3|Hspell:401215|h[Emptiness Between Stars]|h|r.\n$bullet;|cFF2959D3|Hspell:403625|h[Scouring Eternity]|h|r inflicts lethal damage to players not safely hidden behind an |cFF2959D3|Hspell:403497|h[Astral Formation]|h|r.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Healers

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: Scalecommander Sarkareth uses the full might of his dracthyr abilities to deter his foes.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.link: |cff66bbff|Hjournal:2:26140:15|h[Stage One: The Legacy of the Dracthyr]|h|r
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Stage One: The Legacy of the Dracthyr

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: Sarkareth slashes his current target, inflicting 654,136 Physical damage with an additional 53,172 Fire damage every 1 sec for 27 sec. This effect stacks.\n\nUpon expiration, releases a |cffffffffBlazing Blast|r.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Burning Claws

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: Sarkareth draws in power from the Void to enhance his latent abilities.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.link: |cff66bbff|Hjournal:2:26142:15|h[Stage Two: A Touch of the Forbidden]|h|r
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Stage Two: A Touch of the Forbidden

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: Eschewing his draconic abilities, Sarkareth fully embraces the Void in a final bid for power.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Stage Three: The Seas of Infinity

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: Sarkareth slashes his current target and a frontal cone, inflicting 715,341 Physical damage with an additional 163,575 Shadow damage every 2 sec and reducing healing received by 25% for 21 sec. This effect stacks.\n\nUpon expiration, releases a |cffffffffVoid Blast|r.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Void Slash

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: Being struck with most Void abilities causes Oblivion, inflicting 12,268 Shadow damage every 1 sec for 25 sec. Upon reaching 10 applications, the affected player is lost in the |cffffffffEmptiness Between Stars|r.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Oblivion

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: The target is stranded alone in the vast infinite of space, reducing damage done by 99%. After 20 sec, if the target has not recovered fragments of their mind, they are lost forever and perish.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Emptiness Between Stars

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: Sarkareth releases a bone-shaking howl at all players, pushing them away and increasing the incoming effects of Mass Disintegrate, Searing Breath, and Glittering Surge. When struck by any of these, |cffffffffOppressing Howl|r is removed.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Oppressing Howl

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: Sarkareth places several Scorching Bombs nearby players. Each inflicts 126,747 Fire damage to players within 10 yards every 1 sec. After 12 sec, the bombs explode with a |cffffffffScorching Detonation|r.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Scorching Bomb

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: Sarkareth forms a shimmering image that marks players. After 6 sec, energy erupts from the image in a line towards its targets inflicting 163,575 Arcane damage.\n\nIf |cffffffffMass Disintegrate|r strikes a target with |cffffffffOppressing Howl|r, it removes that effect and applies |cffffffffDisintegrated|r.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Mass Disintegrate

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: Sarkareth breathes flames in a frontal cone, inflicting 98,145 Fire damage instantly with an additional 28,626 Fire damage every 1 sec for 12 sec. This attack repeats 3 times and stacks.\n\nIf Searing Breath strikes a target with |cffffffffOppressing Howl|r, it removes that effect and applies |cffffffffSeared|r.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Searing Breath

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: Sarkareth releases pure magic, inflicting 85,815 Arcane damage to all players every 1 sec for 8 sec. \n\nIf |cffffffffGlittering Surge|r strikes a player with |cffffffffOppressing Howl|r, it removes that effect and applies |cffffffffDazzled|r.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Glittering Surge

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: Sarkareth slashes his current target, inflicting 715,341 Physical damage with an additional 183,617 Shadow damage every 2 sec and reducing healing received by 25% for 18 sec. This effect stacks.\n\nUpon expiration, releases a |cffffffffVoid Blast|r.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Void Claws

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: Sarkareth places Void Bombs nearby players. Each inflicts 98,145 Shadow damage to players within 12 yards every 1 sec. After 20 sec, the bombs explode with a |cffffffffVoid Surge|r.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Void Bomb

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: Upon casting any spell, Sarkareth empowers his allies with the might of the Black dragons. This effect increases their damage done and movement speed by 15%. Upon reaching 5 applications, the target becomes immune to crowd controlling and interrupting effects.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Ebon Might

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: Sarkareth places Void Bombs nearby players. Each inflicts 98,145 Shadow damage to players within 12 yards every 1 sec. After 20 sec, the bombs explode with a |cffffffffVoid Surge|r.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Void Bomb

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: Sarkareth flies up through a void portal before crashing through the floor and inflicting 511,173 Shadow damage to players within 30 yards and knocking back players struck.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Cosmic Ascension

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: Sarkareth pulls several asteroids out of space to crash into the ground. These formations inflict 114,503 Shadow damage to nearby players every 2 sec.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Astral Formation

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: Sarkareth tears open portals to infinity, conjuring void images of himself that rush out in a line through a player. These images inflict 163,575 Shadow damage to targets struck.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Hurtling Barrage

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: Sarkareth causes a massive supernova to grow and erupt, inflicting 1 million Shadow damage and knocking back all players not behind an |cffffffffAstral Formation|r.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Scouring Eternity

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: Sarkareth focuses the crushing weight of space upon a player. After 8 sec, a black hole is formed inflicting 1.4 million Shadow damage, split evenly among players struck. \n\nThe black hole also pulls in and absorbs nearby |cffffffffAstral Formation|rs before finally erupting and inflicting 613,408 Shadow damage to all players within 12 yards.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Embrace of Nothingness

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: Sarkareth causes the infinite emptiness of space to weigh heavy on the target's mind, inflicting 57,253 Shadow damage every 3 sec for 30 sec.\n\nUpon removal, this triggers Dread.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Infinite Duress

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: Sarkareth causes the infinite emptiness of space to weigh heavy on the target's mind, inflicting 57,253 Shadow damage every 3 sec for 30 sec.\n\nUpon removal, this triggers Dread.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Infinite Duress

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: The player erupts with a burning nova, inflicting 15% of the total Fire damage taken from |cffffffffBurning Claws|r to all players as Fire damage.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Blazing Blast

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: A fiery blast consumes the bomb, inflicting 61,307 Fire damage to all players instantly with an additional 22,083 Fire damage every 1 sec for 5 sec.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Scorching Detonation

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: The target's mind and body are heavily fractured, reducing movement speed by 25% and inflicting 65,475 Arcane damage every 5 sec.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Disintegrated

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: The player's senses are dazzled, stunning them and inflicting 102,264 Arcane damage every 1 sec for 12 sec.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Dazzled

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: Searing wounds burn the player, inflicting 18,409 Fire damage every 1 sec.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Seared

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: Motes of flame fall from above, inflicting 118,592 Fire damage and knocking back players within 4 yards of the impact.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Drifting Embers

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: When |cffffffffOppressing Howl|r is removed from a player, echoing darkness erupts forth and inflicts 28,626 Shadow damage to all players.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Echoing Howl

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: The bomb erupts with void energy, inflicting 114,503 Shadow damage to all players every 1 sec for 4 sec.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Void Surge

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: A player stepping into the |cffffffffVoid Bomb|r causes the void energy to dissipate into the player. Upon removal, the void energy erupts with a |cffffffffVoid Surge|r unless that player is within the |cffffffffEmptiness Between Stars|r.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Void Fracture

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: The bomb erupts with void energy, inflicting 114,503 Shadow damage to all players every 1 sec for 4 sec.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Void Surge

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: A player stepping into the |cffffffffVoid Bomb|r causes the void energy to dissipate into the player. Upon removal, the void energy erupts with a |cffffffffVoid Surge|r unless that player is within the |cffffffffEmptiness Between Stars|r.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Void Fracture

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: An eruption of dread inflicts 163,575 Shadow damage to all players and knocks them away.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Dread

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: An eruption of dread inflicts 163,575 Shadow damage to all players and knocks them away.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Dread

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: Oblivion motes rain from above, inflicting 49,073 Shadow damage in addition to 5 applications of |cffffffffOblivion|r to players within 3 yards of the impact.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Motes of Oblivion

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: When a |cffffffffScorching Bomb|r erupts, it creates a patch of |cffffffffBurning Ground|r. This ground inflicts 98,145 Fire damage every 1 sec to players within.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Burning Ground

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: While stranded within the |cffffffffEmptiness Between Stars|r, players can absorb |cffffffffAstral Flare|rs to gain 5% increased Haste and 10% increased movement speed for 23 sec. This effect stacks.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Astral Flare

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: The player erupts with a void nova, inflicting 40% of the total Shadow damage taken from |cffffffffVoid Claws|r to players within 20 yards as Shadow damage.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Void Blast

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: A void nova erupts from the target, inflicting 40% of the total Shadow damage taken from |cffffffffVoid Slash|r to all players as Shadow damage.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Void Blast

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: Cosmic energy destabilizes |cffffffffAstral Formation|rs, causing them to explode and inflict 32,715 Shadow damage to and knock back players within 200 yards.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Astral Eruption

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: Sarkareth takes in a deep breath and flies to a location, inflicting 237,184 Shadow damage in a line and knocking players away. This leaves behind void residue which inflicts 28,626 Shadow damage every 0.5 sec to players within.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Abyssal Breath

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: Upon casting Abyssal Breath, Sarkareth leaves behind images of himself.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Null Glimmer

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: Chronal magic rewinds damage taken, restoring 4% of the image's maximum health every 1 sec.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Rescind

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: The image releases a mighty scream, inflicting 163,575 Arcane damage to all players and interrupting spellcasting.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Blasting Scream

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: Sarkareth grows bulbs of void energy at player locations which pulse waves to all players and creatures within them every 0.5 sec, absorbing up to 196,605 healing for 1 min and removing |cffffffffRescind|r.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Desolate Blossom

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: After ascending to the stars, Sarkareth empowers himself with Cosmic energy, increasing his damage done by 10%. This effect stacks.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Void Might

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: Upon casting Cosmic Ascension, Sarkareth leaves behind images of himself.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Null Glimmer

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: Chronal magic rewinds damage taken, restoring 4% of the image's maximum health every 1 sec.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Rescind

10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.description: The image releases a mighty scream, inflicting 163,575 Arcane damage to all players and interrupting spellcasting.
10:Scalecommander Sarkareth.title: Blasting Scream

02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.description: As combat unfolds, Kazzara tears open |cFF2959D3|Hspell:407196|h[Dread Rifts]|h|r from which |cFF2959D3|Hspell:407069|h[Rays of Anguish]|h|r will form to hunt players. At 80%, 60%, and 40% health remaining, plates of Kazzara's menacing armor are shattered off during |cFF2959D3|Hspell:401319|h[Hellsteel Carnage]|h|r, intensifying her |cFF2959D3|Hspell:408367|h[Infernal Heart]|h|r.
02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.title: Overview

02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.description: $bullet;|cFF2959D3|Hspell:404744|h[Terror Claws]|h|r inflict heavy damage and increase damage taken from further casts.\n$bullet;Upon reaching 100 energy, |cFF2959D3|Hspell:400430|h[Hellbeam]|h|r is unleashed inflicting massive damage to anyone caught in the effect.
02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.title: Tanks

02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.description: $bullet;|cFF2959D3|Hspell:407069|h[Rays of Anguish]|h|r hunt players and leave behind a |cFF2959D3|Hspell:402421|h[Molten Scar]|h|r until they are consumed by a |cFF2959D3|Hspell:407046|h[Dread Rift]|h|r.\n$bullet;|cFF2959D3|Hspell:407069|h[Rays of Anguish]|h|r crossing onto an existing |cFF2959D3|Hspell:402421|h[Molten Scar]|h|r cause |cFF2959D3|Hspell:408147|h[Infernal Fusion]|h|r.\n$bullet;Upon reaching 100 energy, |cFF2959D3|Hspell:400430|h[Hellbeam]|h|r is unleashed inflicting massive damage to anyone caught in the effect.
02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.title: Damage Dealers

02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.description: $bullet;|cFF2959D3|Hspell:407069|h[Rays of Anguish]|h|r hunt players and leave behind a |cFF2959D3|Hspell:402421|h[Molten Scar]|h|r until they are consumed by a |cFF2959D3|Hspell:407046|h[Dread Rift]|h|r.\n$bullet;|cFF2959D3|Hspell:407069|h[Rays of Anguish]|h|r crossing onto an existing |cFF2959D3|Hspell:402421|h[Molten Scar]|h|r cause |cFF2959D3|Hspell:408147|h[Infernal Fusion]|h|r.\n$bullet;|cFF2959D3|Hspell:403326|h[Wings of Extinction]|h|r and |cFF2959D3|Hspell:408367|h[Infernal Heart]|h|r inflict heavy raidwide damage.
02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.title: Healers

02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.description: Powerful elementium plates maintain the integrity of Kazzara's volatile core. At 80%, 60%, and 40% health, sections of armor are shattered off into |cffffffffHellsteel Fragments|r. The calamitous blast inflicts 164,217 Shadowflame damage to all players.
02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.title: Hellsteel Carnage

02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.description: Upon reaching 100 energy, Kazzara unleashes an annihilating beam from her jaws, inflicting 246,326 Shadowflame damage every 0.3 sec for 3 sec to any players caught inside. The superheated breath inflicts an additional 16,413 Shadowflame damage every 0.3 sec to all players.\n\nKazzara disgorges increasing amounts of |cffffffffRevenant's Blood|r as her armor is shattered off.
02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.title: Hellbeam

02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.description: Kazzara summons fragments of blazing energy to blast out from |cffffffffDread Rifts|r. Each fragment ignites a blistering beam and hunts a nearby player, leaving a |cffffffffMolten Scar|r in its wake. Touching the beam inflicts 191,587 Shadowflame damage every 0.3 sec.\n\n|TInterface\EncounterJournal\UI-EJ-WarningTextIcon:0:0:0:0|t|CFF741A02On Heroic and Mythic difficulties, Rays of Anguish will continue to hunt players until they are consumed by a Dread Rift.|r
02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.title: Rays of Anguish

02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.description: Scorched ground that inflicts 109,478 Shadowflame damage every 1 sec to players standing within the effect.
02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.title: Molten Scar

02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.description: Kazzara thrashes her fiery wings, inflicting 136,848 Shadowflame damage to all players and pushing them away. The flames linger, inflicting an additional 49,265 Shadowflame damage every 2 sec for 20 sec.
02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.title: Wings of Extinction

02:Kazzara, the Hellforged.description: Kazzara releases a furious roar that incites a burning mark within several players.
